title: Hotel
occurrences: Why? Want to get the Taj Mahal made? - No, a hotel, in Balipuram.
I want a plot in Balipuram, to construct a hotel.
Don't worry about that. I will get you a hotel plot at such a place...
that when people come to your hotel, they will be awed...
Lalwani, I have given the hotel contract to Mr. chhagan Patel.
This plot is perfect for a hotel.
This is the hotel plan, sir. Hold this, Lalwani.
From orphanage to hotel? My God! this is too much.
Nowwhether a hotel comes up on it, or an orphanage, what do you lose?
Whores will dance! A hotel will come up here.
Not a hotel George, an orphanage is being build here.
Father, I bought this land to construct a hotel.
Hotel? But I have the agreement.
if he goes to Balipuram and does the hotel decoration.
He's enjoying himself. He's written this letter from the hotel bathroom.
It's good you got him involved in the hotel work.
million... to build a hotel on it?
You build a hotel instead of an orphanage?
My ice will melt. What will I tell the hotel guy?
The new hotel... - So what if a new hotel has come up?
There's the hotel. The one who made it must be an ass.
He made the hotel so far in the mountains.
a job in this hotel. I'm a very good cook.
The hotel is made well.
Why didrt you stop him for the hotel opening?
chhagan Patel is an intelligent man. He's made a very good hotel.
I came today. I heard a new hotel had opened, so I thought I'll stay here.
He is the owner of this hotel.
Since this hotel is made, he used to roam around this hotel.
You said we will go to the new hotel, romance, talk romantic.
We'll go back to the hotel. I'll get the road cleared tomorrow.
Wonder what's happening in this hotel.
Strange noises are coming from the old shed behind the hotel.
Don't you knowyour hotel is built on an old graveyard?
or of the fact that this hotel is build on a graveyard?
Sir, you have no right to complain. You asked me to make the hotel...
chhagan Patel! I got you the contract to make a hotel, not to cheat.
What's the big deal if I made the hotel over a graveyard?
I'll never come to this hotel again.
vijay, it will be better if we turn this hotel into an orphanage.
by turning your hotel into an orphanage.
